5.Speaker: speaker2

66.Response: Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: It's a brick ! I can't believe how stupid I was . Damn it !

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: What is it ? Why did you buy a brick ?

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: There was a guy on the sidewalk.He had three new boxes , Panasonic video camera boxes.He said he had to get rid of them quick .

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: So he said he'd sell me one for twenty dollars . A four-hundred-dollar camera for twenty bucks .

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: I can't believe how stupid you are . Why didn't you open the box ?

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: I wanted to . But he said , no , the box is still in its plastic wrap from the store.If it's opened , other people won't believe it's new .

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: So he had the boxes wrapped in plastic .

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: Yes , it was the kind of perfect plastic wrap that comes with new products.Look , it even had a bar-code price sticker on it ! It looked brand new .

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: But why would a guy be selling new video cameras for twenty dollars ?

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: He said he had to get rid of them . They were stolen .

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: Aha ! Now I understand.You were trying to buy stolen goods on the sidewalk.So , what I think is , you deserve to get cheated !

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: C'mon , don't blame me ! I thought it was a new camera . We could use it.We were even thinking about buying a camera . I don't understand how he could have such a perfect-looking box .

66.Speaker: speaker2
66.Response: That's no problem.He just has a friend who works in a shop that can do plastic wrap . That's easy.And probably it's the same shop he got the boxes from.Maybe his friend works in an electronics store . They sell video cameras there.Probably they had a couple video camera boxes lying around.So they get the idea of wrapping bricks to sell to fools like you.Twenty dollars a brick . That's a good profit if they can sell enough bricks .

66.Speaker: speaker1
66.Response: You're right , Sarah . I was a fool . I can't believe it . How could I fall for such a trick ?

96.Speaker: speaker2

96.Speaker: speaker1
96.Response: It's no good . And I think spending several hours each day playing computer games is a waste of time . You might as well do something healthy and meaningful .

96.Response: I hope I can practice self-control again .
